Class Explosion

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.Explosion
public class Explosion extends Entity
Represents an explosion entity in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Explosion

      public Explosion(int posX, int posY, String direction, int frameY)
      Constructs a new Explosion object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      posX - The x-coordinate of the explosion's position.
      posY - The y-coordinate of the explosion's position.
      direction - The direction of the explosion.
      frameY - The starting frame index of the explosion animation.
